entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Clarenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:42 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terra Nova National Park 12:30 PM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: -0.7°C
Wind: NNE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Flurries or periods of drizzle with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near zero. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Wednesday 08 March 2023
